The search results show information about Polish translations and quotes from "The Little Prince" (Mały Książę). The search reveals discussions about different Polish translations of the famous quote from Antoine de Saint-Exupéry's work, particularly focusing on variations of the phrase about seeing with the heart.

There are multiple Polish translations of the well-known quote, with some versions using "największe rzeczy widzi się tylko sercem" and others using "prawdziwie widzi się tylko sercem". The search results include Polish literature websites and forums discussing these translation differences and their interpretations.
